shiftend.name: ShiftEnd
shiftend.tagline: From paper chaos to a streamlined digital workflow.
shiftend.description: ShiftEnd is a SaaS tool that simplifies compliance for Belgian restaurants by replacing the traditional dagontvangstenboek with a sleek, affordable, and legally compliant platform.
shiftend.longDescription: Small restaurants in Belgium without GKS (cash register systems) are required by law to maintain a daily sales log, often done on paper. This process is tedious, error prone, and outdated. ShiftEnd was built to digitize this workflow while keeping compliance at its core. Designed for non technical users, ShiftEnd emphasizes simplicity, affordability, and legal assurance.
features: Multilingual UI for Dutch, French, and English users
Automated daily reporting and confirmation emails
Affordable SaaS pricing tailored for small horeca
shiftend.challenge: Ensuring full compliance with Belgian regulations while designing a minimal UI for non technical users. Building trust for a legally sensitive workflow and scaling the system for multi restaurant support. The traditional paper based dagontvangstenboek system was error prone, time consuming, and difficult to audit.
shiftend.solution: We created a clean, guided interface that simplifies data entry while embedding compliance logic. Multilingual support and an onboarding flow ensure accessibility for a wide user base. The system includes automated compliance checks, digital signatures for daily closures, and comprehensive audit trails that meet FOD requirements.
results: Time savings: Replaced hours of paperwork with a few clicks
Confidence: Full legal compliance without added complexity
Accessibility: Affordable pricing makes it a no brainer for small horeca businesses
Multi location support for restaurant chains
7 year data retention for tax compliance
Real time access for tax inspectors (FOD)

process.discovery: We conducted extensive research with Belgian restaurant owners to understand their compliance challenges, existing workflows, and pain points with the traditional dagontvangstenboek system.
process.design: Created intuitive interfaces that work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices, with a focus on usability for non technical restaurant staff in busy environments.
process.development: Built a scalable backend architecture using Laravel and PostgreSQL, ensuring reliability and performance while maintaining full FOD compliance requirements.
process.testing: Comprehensive testing with real restaurant teams and compliance verification to ensure the platform meets Belgian legal requirements and user workflows.
process.deployment: Smooth rollout with comprehensive training and support, ensuring successful adoption across all restaurant staff levels and compliance verification.

technicalDetails.frontend: Vue.js 3 SPA with Vuetify components and responsive design
technicalDetails.backend: Laravel 12 API with PostgreSQL database and Laravel Sanctum authentication
technicalDetails.infrastructure: Railway deployment with Docker containers and automated CI/CD
technicalDetails.security: Enterprise grade security with role based access control, audit logging, and data encryption
technicalDetails.scalability: Multi tenant architecture designed for horizontal scaling across multiple restaurant locations

testimonials.quote: ShiftEnd has transformed how we handle our daily sales logging. What used to take hours of paperwork is now just a few clicks, and we're fully compliant with Belgian regulations.
testimonials.author: Marie Dubois

availly.name: Availly
availly.tagline: Availability you share, privacy you keep.
availly.description: Availly is a lightweight tool for managing personal and business availability, offering a sleek calendar UI and powerful sharing features.
availly.longDescription: Managing time across clients, projects, or personal commitments is often chaotic. Existing solutions are either bloated or lack customization for small teams and freelancers. Availly was designed as a lean scheduling platform: lightweight, beautiful, and shareable. With a focus on simplicity and performance, it removes friction from booking and availability management.
features: Shareable booking links for clients or colleagues
Privacy first approach with read only calendar scopes
One time link generation for specific time ranges
availly.challenge: Designing a tool that's powerful yet lightweight, balancing simplicity with flexible sharing features. Building a responsive, mobile first UI that works seamlessly across different calendar providers while maintaining privacy and performance standards.
availly.solution: We built a modern, fast single page app with a focus on usability and design minimalism. Availly emphasizes clarity, with clean UI components and smooth calendar interactions. The platform uses a privacy first approach, encrypting tokens at rest and caching only time ranges without storing event details.
results: Efficiency: Reduced scheduling back and forth
Accessibility: Simple interface for all user types
Professionalism: Shareable links and branding options
Privacy: Read only calendar access with encrypted tokens
Performance: Fast, responsive interface with real time sync
Integration: Seamless connection with major calendar providers
Scalability: Built for growth with microservices architecture

process.discovery: Analyzed scheduling workflows across different professional contexts to identify common pain points and opportunities for simplification.
process.design: Created a clean, minimalist design system focused on calendar clarity and ease of use, with mobile first responsive design principles.
process.development: Built a robust Laravel backend with React frontend, integrating multiple calendar APIs while maintaining privacy and performance standards.
process.testing: Comprehensive testing across different calendar providers, timezone scenarios, and user workflows to ensure reliability and accuracy.
process.deployment: Phased rollout with continuous monitoring and optimization based on user feedback and performance metrics, deployed on Railway with Supabase.

technicalDetails.frontend: React 19 SPA with Tailwind CSS for styling and responsive design
technicalDetails.backend: Laravel 12 API with PostgreSQL database and Redis caching
technicalDetails.infrastructure: Railway deployment with Supabase for database and real time features
technicalDetails.security: Privacy first approach with encrypted tokens, read only calendar scopes, and rate limited public endpoints
technicalDetails.scalability: Microservices architecture with event driven design patterns and horizontal scaling capabilities

testimonials.quote: Availly has streamlined our entire scheduling process. The calendar integrations work seamlessly, and our clients love the simple booking experience.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen
